# Fragment Drops — ULTRA Part4 (2025-12-24)

Adds **2500** in-world readable drops (FRAG-U4-12000 to FRAG-U4-14499).

Use these as lootable notes, shelf scraps, dock tags, tide prayers, or courier stubs.

> — the corner is torn on purpose.
> — a second message hides under the stamp.
> — a second message hides under the stamp.
> — someone scratched out a name.
> — the last line is written backwards.
> — the handwriting changes halfway through.
> — someone scratched out a name.
> — the ink runs when the weather turns.
> — a wax drip seals the margin.
> — someone scratched out a name.

- Place this near POI-U4-0891 to breadcrumb a micro-location.
